ygData.subject: Re: Shadow Wing is now Ice
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: She got up and deiced that feeling sorry for herself wasn t going to get her anywhere. She got up and looked around. Getting  somewhere is the trick.

Ice::

She got up and deiced that feeling sorry for herself wasn't going to 
get her anywhere. She got up and looked around. "Getting  somewhere 
is the trick." She walked out of the lab.  She checked to make sure 
her mind wasn't projecting. She didn't want Veratis to hear her.  She 
slowly and carefully, walked to the entrance of the ship.  Her left 
shoulder had stopped bleeding, but her rght shoulder hadn't healed 
yet.  So she left small droplets of blood on the floor as she walked 
along. She went to the entrance and walked outside into the snow. She 
sniffed the cold air and started out into the snow.  The clouds had 
covered the sky and it was starting to snow. She knew that with her 
new form, she could hide in plain sight and not be seen. She walked 
out and kept walking in a northern direction.
